name: Open♡
description:
Open your heart

Lay foundations and support those that come after you. Work with them to achieve harmony.

Sometimes when you look out for yourself, others pay the price. Sometimes when you feel that you are wasting your time, you are building the way for others. Sometimes all you need to do is show compassion.

Make this a safe space.

Controls
  • Arrow keys: Move in a straight line, until you hit a wall.
  • X / V / M: Button X - restart level.
  • Z / C / N: Button O - restart stage.
  • Make your way to an exit in each stage.
  • Collect hearts to make your previous self safe to touch.
  • If you get stuck, try restarting the level and taking different paths.
